headline: Risotto raises $10M seed to use AI to make ticketing systems easier to use
summary: Designed to autonomously resolve help desk tickets, Risotto has raised $10 million in seed funding in a round led by Bonfire Ventures.

headline: ServiceNow (NOW) Q4 Earnings Report Preview: What To Look For
summary: Enterprise workflow automation company ServiceNow (NYSE:NOW) will be reporting results this Wednesday afternoon. Here’s what to expect.

headline: Jim Cramer Says ServiceNow CEO “Gotta Bring His A Game to Explain What’s Happening”
